item.title: 2019#6 Readings of the week
item.description: Software engineering, adtech, psychology, python. Expect a similar wide range in the future as well. You can check all my weekly readings by checking the [tag here](https://www.mostlymaths.net/search/label/ReadingsOfTheWeek, Readings) . You can also get these as a weekly newsletter by subscribing here.

item.title: Things3 Weekly Review mode shortcut(s)
item.description: This is how I handle the dreaded GTD (Getting Things Done) weekly review when using Things 3.
